scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && cp ./src/react/build/.htaccess ./build/.htaccess && echo "Build finished. At /build. " && exit 0
scripts.build-wp: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && cp ./src/react/build/.htaccess ./build/.htaccess && cp -R ./src/wp ./build && echo "Build finished. At /build. " && exit 0
scripts.react-install:
npm install --silent --save react react-dom react-redux@5 react-router@4 react-router-dom@4.3 preact@8 preact-compat@3 uglifyjs-webpack-plugin dynamic-polyfill compression-webpack-plugin@2.0 optimize-css-assets-webpack-plugin html-loader html-webpack-plugin react-helmet redux babel babel-polyfill babel-core babel-plugin-transform-object-assign babel-preset-react-hmre babel-preset-stage-3 babel-loader@7 babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react webpack webpack-cli webpack-dev-server node-sass mini-css-extract-plugin css-hot-loader css-loader file-loader sass-loader style-loader wordpress-js-api-wrapper && echo "All modules are now installed and ready to use. Available commands:
Start local server: npm start"
